text: Arjuni Railway Station (station code: AJU) serves Arjuni Morgaon city and surrounding towns and villages in Arjuni Morgaon subdivision of Gondia District, Bhandara District and Gadchiroli District in Maharashtra State, India. ==References== Category:Gondia district Category:Railway stations in Gondia district Category:Nagpur SEC railway division
title: Arjuni railway station
